channel.title: Need help Read Plz ,something with my host
channel.description:
hello,
if i wanna host with no-ip no1 can get on , but if they got hamachi open and they hav joined my network they can login with no-ip , but without hamachi they can't , how to fix this? or how can host without hamachi , like a normal ip or somethin plz help me , i like it if you can tell me the No-Ip "bug" "problem"
i mean, tnx,if you help xD[br][size=1]Posted at: October 18, 2006, 08:57:05 AM[/size][hr]PLZ help :confused: :(
